summary.para: [The feature associated with this page, DirectShow, is a legacy feature. It has been superseded by MediaPlayer and . MediaPlayer and IMFMediaEngine have been optimized for Windows 10 and Windows 11. Microsoft strongly recommends that new code use MediaPlayer and IMFMediaEngine instead of DirectShow, when possible. Microsoft suggests that existing code that uses the legacy APIs be rewritten to use the new APIs if possible.]
Defines a subset of the DVD text-string types.

member.name: DVD_TextStringType.DVD_Struct_Volume
member.summary: Indicates the top-level of the logical hierarchy. Refers to the entire contents of a one-sided disc or one side of a two-sided disc.

member.name: DVD_TextStringType.DVD_Struct_Title
member.summary: Indicates that all content strings, until the next DVD_Struct_Title, belong to one title.

member.name: DVD_TextStringType.DVD_Struct_ParentalID
member.summary: Indicates the parental ID of the following strings.

member.name: DVD_TextStringType.DVD_Struct_PartOfTitle
member.summary: Indicates that all content strings, until the next DVD_Struct_PartOfTitle, belong to one chapter.

member.name: DVD_TextStringType.DVD_Struct_Cell
member.summary: Indicates that all content strings, until the next DVD_Struct_Cell, belong to one cell, which can be a scene from a chapter.

member.name: DVD_TextStringType.DVD_Stream_Audio
member.summary: Indicates that the following content strings refer to the audio stream.

member.name: DVD_TextStringType.DVD_Stream_Subpicture
member.summary: Indicates that the following content strings refer to the subpicture stream.

member.name: DVD_TextStringType.DVD_Stream_Angle
member.summary: Indicates that the following content strings refer to the angle.

member.name: DVD_TextStringType.DVD_Channel_Audio
member.summary: Indicates that the following content strings refer to the audio channel.

member.name: DVD_TextStringType.DVD_General_Name
member.summary: Indicates the most important content string. Strings of this type contain the name of the volume, title, chapter, and so on, and can follow any structure identifiers.

member.name: DVD_TextStringType.DVD_General_Comments
member.summary: Identifies a content string with additional information about the title, chapter, and so on, described by the DVD_General_Name string. The exact nature or structure of these comments is not defined.

member.name: DVD_TextStringType.DVD_Title_Series
member.summary: Identifies a content string containing the name of a series to which the title belongs.

member.name: DVD_TextStringType.DVD_Title_Movie
member.summary: Identifies a content string with the main movie title.

member.name: DVD_TextStringType.DVD_Title_Video
member.summary: Identifies a content string containing the name of the video title.

member.name: DVD_TextStringType.DVD_Title_Album
member.summary: Identifies a content string containing the name of the album title.

member.name: DVD_TextStringType.DVD_Title_Song
member.summary: Identifies a content string containing the name of the song title.

member.name: DVD_TextStringType.DVD_Title_Other
member.summary: Identifies a content string containing the name of the title of some other genre.

member.name: DVD_TextStringType.DVD_Title_Sub_Series
member.summary: Identifies a content string with the name of the series localized to a particular country/region.

member.name: DVD_TextStringType.DVD_Title_Sub_Movie
member.summary: Identifies a content string with the movie title localized to a particular country/region.

member.name: DVD_TextStringType.DVD_Title_Sub_Video
member.summary: Identifies a content string with the video title localized to a particular country/region.

member.name: DVD_TextStringType.DVD_Title_Sub_Album
member.summary: Identifies a content string with the album title localized to a particular country/region.

member.name: DVD_TextStringType.DVD_Title_Sub_Song
member.summary: Identifies a content string with the song title localized to a particular country/region.

member.name: DVD_TextStringType.DVD_Title_Sub_Other
member.summary: Identifies a content string with the title of some other genre localized to a particular country/region.

member.name: DVD_TextStringType.DVD_Title_Orig_Series
member.summary: Identifies a content string with the original name of the series.

member.name: DVD_TextStringType.DVD_Title_Orig_Movie
member.summary: Identifies a content string with the original name of the movie.

member.name: DVD_TextStringType.DVD_Title_Orig_Video
member.summary: Identifies a content string with the original name of the video.

member.name: DVD_TextStringType.DVD_Title_Orig_Album
member.summary: Identifies a content string with the original name of the album.

member.name: DVD_TextStringType.DVD_Title_Orig_Song
member.summary: Identifies a content string with the original name of the song.

member.name: DVD_TextStringType.DVD_Title_Orig_Other
member.summary: Identifies a content string with the original name of the content.

member.name: DVD_TextStringType.DVD_Other_Scene
member.summary: Identifies a content string pertaining to a particular scene in a movie or video.

member.name: DVD_TextStringType.DVD_Other_Cut
member.summary: Identifies a content string pertaining to a particular cut in a movie or video.

member.name: DVD_TextStringType.DVD_Other_Take
member.summary: Identifies a content string pertaining to a particular take in a movie or video.
